name: NSPersistentCloudKitContainer.Event
desc: An object that represents activity in a persistent CloudKit container.

items.name: var type: NSPersistentCloudKitContainer.EventType
items.desc: The type of event, either setup, import, or export.

items.name: var identifier: UUID
items.desc: A unique identifier for the event in a container.

items.name: var storeIdentifier: String
items.desc: The associated store identifier in the container for the event.

items.name: var succeeded: Bool
items.desc: A Boolean value that indicates whether the operation the event represents is successful.

items.name: var startDate: Date
items.desc: The start date of the operation that the event represents.

items.name: var endDate: Date?
items.desc: The end date of the operation that the event represents.

items.name: var error: Error?
items.desc: An error that indicates why an operation fails.
